channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 05:00 plowing anxiety in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 05:00 plowing anxiety in Kyiv. Investigate by subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 03:01 Drive alarm to the Khmelnytsky region. Watch for further reports.
